item.title: Ok, A REAL Question
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:8, topic:332171”][quote author=Mental Piracy link=topic=428609.msg3146449#msg3146449 date=1268098449]
these people posting above me are making me facepalm…an unreachable error means that somewhere ABOVE the code you posted you have more "break;"s than you need. Find the extra one and delete it. It has nothing to do with the code you posted or anything below it.
[/quote]Wow you’re dumb…there are most definately mistakes in the code he posted. Please refrain from trying to give information that you yourself do not know.

Although, you are right about there being errors above the code as well, seeing as even his first statement is unreachable.

[code]
case BLAHALBLAHAA:
c.q12help();
break;
case BALHALHSDLFAHSDLFAH:
c.q13help();
break;

…etc…[/code]

ghostly: this will help you more than anything.[/quote]
To bad for you, you confirmed what i posted. Please refrain from saying i am stupid when in fact i was right. The error he asked about lies above the code he posted. Im sure there are errors in the code, but thats not what he asked about. I didnt even look at it as soon as i read it was an unreachable error. So thanks for trying to call me out for being right? Nice try though. If you could actually read, i stated " It has nothing to do with the code you posted or anything below it. " which is also correct, i never said the code he posted was free of errors. What wonderful mods moparscape has, not only can one of them not read, but he flames me for being correct.

Now to fix the rest of the code since ive looked at it. You cannot do it like that. if you want one case to activate all those then it has to be like

case 0: c.q12help(); c.q13help(); break;
or if each one needs to be under a different case use what Evil_ posted.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok, A REAL Question
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Guys, Here is a real question now… I was adding this:

c.q12help(); break; c.q13help(); break; c.q14help(); break; c.q15help(); break; c.q16help(); break; c.q17help(); break; c.q18help(); break;
to clicking most.java when I got this error in the compiler:

clickingMost.java:143: unreachable statement c.q12help(); ^ clickingMost.java:145: unreachable statement c.q13help(); ^ clickingMost.java:147: unreachable statement c.q14help(); ^ clickingMost.java:149: unreachable statement c.q15help(); ^ clickingMost.java:151: unreachable statement c.q16help(); ^ clickingMost.java:153: unreachable statement c.q17help(); ^ clickingMost.java:155: unreachable statement c.q18help();
Is there something I need to add to this code anywhere else? I’m trying to make it so when you click on the quest it shows the interface.

Read full topic
